help.content:
`ğŸ‘‹` Hello! I am <@{bot}>, a music bot. You can use `{prefix}help <command>` to get more information about a command.

`ğŸ‘` Vote for the bot to unlock features! [Vote Here](https://top.gg/bot/{client}/vote)
help.title: ğŸ“– Help Menu
help.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> for more information about a command.

247.description: Configures the bot to stay in the voice channel.

errors.not_in_voice: `âŒ` | You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.generic: `âŒ` | An error occurred while executing this command.

messages.enabled:
`âœ…` | 24/7 mode has been **enabled**. 
`ğŸ§` The bot will stay in the voice channel, even if there is no one left.

dj.description: Manage DJ mode and associated roles.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add.
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove.

messages.role_exists: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already added.
messages.role_added: `ğŸ§` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been added.
messages.role_not_found: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is not added.
messages.role_removed: `ğŸ—‘ï¸` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been removed.
messages.all_roles_cleared: `ğŸ§¹` | All DJ roles have been cleared.

options.language: The language you want to set.
options.reset: Reset the language to the default language.

errors.invalid_language:
`âŒ` | Please provide a valid language. Example: `EnglishUS` for English (United States)

You can find the list of supported languages [here](https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#locales)

**Available Languages:**
{languages}

messages.already_set: The language is already set to `{language}`.
messages.set: `âœ…` | The language has been set to `{language}`.

options.reset: Reset the server settings to default.

errors.reset_error: `âŒ` | The `{parameter}` setting could not be reset. Please check the parameter name.
errors.reset_missing: `âŒ` | You must specify a parameter to reset.

messages.reset_success: `âœ…` | The `{parameter}` setting has been reset successfully.

prefix.description: Displays or sets the bot's prefix.

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set.
options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default.

errors.prefix_too_long: `âŒ` | The prefix cannot be longer than 3 characters.

messages.current_prefix: The prefix for this server is `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_set: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_reset: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.

options.theme: The theme to set (classic, modern or modernpro).

errors.choice: `âŒ` | Invalid theme. Available themes are `classic`, `modern` and `modernpro`.

theme.set_theme: `âœ…` | The theme has been set to **{theme}**.
theme.reset: `âœ…` | The theme has been reset to **{defaultTheme}**.

defaultvolume.description: Sets or resets the default volume for the server.

options.reset: Reset the default volume to the default level.

errors.invalid_number: `âŒ` | The volume you entered is not a valid number.
errors.too_low: `âŒ` | The volume is too low. It must be at least 0.
errors.too_high: `âŒ` | The volume is too high. It cannot exceed 200.

messages.set: `ğŸ”Š` | The default volume has been set to {volume}.
messages.reset: The default volume has been reset to {volume}.

errors.channel_exists: `âŒ` | The song request channel already exists.
errors.channel_not_exists: `âŒ` | The song request channel does not exist.
errors.channel_delete_fail: `âŒ` | The song request channel has been deleted. If the channel is not deleted normally, please delete it yourself.

messages.channel_created: `ğŸ‰` | The song request channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: `ğŸ—‘ï¸` | The song request channel has been deleted.

options.level: The BassBoost level you want to set

pitch.description: Changes the pitch of the song.

options.pitch: The number you want to set the pitch to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `âŒ` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.pitch_set: `âœ…` | The pitch has been set to **{pitch}**.

rate.description: Changes the rate of the song.

options.rate: The number you want to set the rate to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `âŒ` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.rate_set: `âœ…` | The rate has been set to **{rate}**.

speed.description: Changes the speed of the song.

options.speed: The speed you want to set (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `âŒ` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.set_speed: `âœ…` | The speed has been set to **{speed}**.

errors.dm_failed: `âŒ` | I couldn't send you a DM. Make sure direct message is enabled.

grab.description: Gets the currently playing song in your DMs.

errors.not_in_channel: `âŒ` | I am not in a voice channel.

loop.description: Loop the current song or queue.

messages.successfully_paused: `â¸ï¸` | The song has been paused successfully.

play.description: Play a song from YouTube, Spotify or http.

options.song: The song you want to play.

playnext.description: Add the song to play next in the queue.

options.song: The song you want to play.

messages.added_to_play_next: `ğŸ¶` | Adding [{title}]({uri}) to play next in the queue.
messages.added_playlist_to_play_next: `ğŸ¶` | Adding {length} songs to play next in the queue.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

options.song: The number of the song you want to remove.

errors.invalid_number: `âŒ` | Please provide a valid song number.

messages.removed: `ğŸ—‘ï¸` | Song number {songNumber} removed from the queue.

errors.not_seekable: `âŒ` | Cannot replay this song because it is not seekable.

options.song: The song you want to search for.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific time in the song.

options.duration: The duration you want to seek to.

errors.invalid_format: `âŒ` | Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
errors.beyond_duration: `âŒ` | Cannot seek beyond the song duration of {length}.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue.

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue.

volume.description: Sets the volume of the player.

options.number: The volume you want to set.

messages.too_low: `âŒ` | The volume cannot be lower than 0.
messages.too_high: `âŒ` | The volume cannot be higher than 200. Do you want to damage your hearing or your speakers? Hmm, I don't think that's a good idea.
messages.no_player: `âŒ` | There is no active player in this server.

addsong.description: Adds a song to the playlist.

options.song: The song you want to add.

messages.playlist_exists: `âŒ` | A playlist with this name already exists. Please use a different name.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete.

list.description: Gets all playlists of the user.

options.user: The user you want to get the playlists of.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load.

removesong.description: Removes a song from the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from.
options.song: The song you want to remove.

messages.error_occurred: `âŒ` | An error occurred while removing the song.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists.

options.user: The user you want to steal the playlist from.

messages.playlist_not_exist: `âŒ` | This playlist does not exist for the mentioned user.

dispatcher.title: Empty Voice Channel
dispatcher.description:
I left <#{voiceChannel}> because I was left alone. 

To enable 24/7 mode, use the `24/7` command. Unlock more features by voting.

I left <#{voiceChannel}> because I was left alone. 

To enable 24/7 mode, use the `24/7` command. Unlock more features by voting, or gain access to exclusive features with our premium version.
